description:
As a founding member of the Bos & Glazier law firm in Grand Rapids, Michigan, Bradley Glazier focuses his practice exclusively on employment law and employment litigation. Serving clients throughout the Grand Rapids metro area as well as across Kent, Ottawa and Muskegon counties, Mr. Glazier advocates aggressively on behalf of those adversely affected by work-related issues, including all of the following:

  • Breach of contract disputes
  • Shareholder disputes
  • Non-compete matters
  • Whistleblowers
  • Retaliation and wrongful termination
  • FMLA issues
  • Wage and hour disputes
  • Workplace discrimination and sexual harassment

Having begun his legal career in 1983, Mr. Glazier honed his legal skills at other area law firms before helping to establish our practice in 1995. Since that time, Mr. Glazier has devoted his time and resources to protecting the rights of employees. With over 30 years of professional legal experience, Mr. Glazier possesses the knowledge and resources necessary to handle any client's case no matter the challenges or complexities involved.

An award-winning trial attorney, Mr. Glazier is also an effective mediator and arbitrator who always has his clients' best interests at heart. If your employer violated your basic rights or if you need effective representation for some other workplace grievance, you can contact Bradley Glazier at the Bos & Glazier law firm to schedule a free initial consultation.
